notifications.title: Delivery Successful

notifications.message: Route for today has been updated. Please check your assigned routes.

notifications.title: Delivery Delayed
notifications.message: Your delivery to [Recipient Name] at [Delivery Address] has been delayed. Please inform the recipient.

notifications.title: Feedback Received

notifications.title: New Order
